Header.title: Ready, Set, Health!
Header.text2: A demo day for excited investors and early-stage startups in healthcare

About.paragraph: Phoenix Consulting Group is a UC Berkeley-based student group dedicated to consulting for the healthcare, life sciences, and biotech industries. As a way to further the health-tech industry, weâ€™re launching an accelerator program for early-stage startups. We're kicking things off by connecting exciting early-stage startups with investors in our first-ever Demo Day May 4, 2021!
